src_original: kati caite sarvāstivādā ityāha [296/08]  caturvidhāḥ // VAkK_5.25 // [296/09]
sa kilāha / [296/10-296/11]  pravartamānasya bhāvānyathātvaṃ bhavati na dravyānyathātvam / [296/11-296/12]
yathā suvarṇabhājanasya bhittvā 'nyathā kriyamāṇasya saṃsthānānyathātvaṃ bhavati na varṇānyathātvam / [296/12-296/13]
yathā ca kṣīraṃ dadhitvena pariṇamadrasavīryavipākān parityajati na varṇam / [296/13-296/14]
